Articles.Content: I know that this is quite an old thread, but I have a question: What floats best?
Hello @Puntherline. Buoyancy was fundamentally changed recently, so your question has been moved to its own thread because the information in that other one was no longer relevant.
empty MK2, MK3 and structural fuselage in general... and for Stationary floating crafts, the Inflatable Heat shield is the best...
